title: Is the only thing that's really real our minds? - Quora

response.answer_text: As I get older, I'm inclined to believe that my consciousness is the font from which all reality springs. As an example, ill use the NUMEROUS INSTANCES which should have killed me, but for some strange reason did not.
Hey, I know my mind is really real. I don’t know what makes you think yours is. You dream creatures, so amusing. How do I come up with you. And so many!
